roleset.name: set somebody more firmly in a position

role.descr: entity becoming more firm in its position

example.name: always with 'designed'?
example.text: Royal's suit contends that [the Ammann acquisition]-1 was ``designed *trace*-1 to entrench management and thwart Royal's offer.''

roleset.note: Ignore adjectival usages: "management's entrenched position". Also, Idon't know for sure that the position will ever be mentioned, but theframing is there in case we do see it.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'entrench' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. More frequent than you might expect. No verbnet entry.
